mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login (loginno, ip, id, sw, logindate) VALUES (LOGIN_SEQ.nextval, #{ip}, #{id}, #{sw}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT loginno, ip, id, sw, logindate FROM login ORDER BY loginno DESC
SELECT loginno, ip, id, sw, logindate FROM login WHERE id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY loginno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM login WHERE id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT loginno, ip, id, sw, logindate FROM login WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY loginno DESC
